trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Butte
There were no other sightings in Butte on or around November 1st 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving west on Amherst avenue. I look up to the south-west and I saw 3 red zigzag formation of red lights the last fireball dropped a smaller red object that fell a short ways then went dark. this happened in butte Montana.
